spell.name: Milk Blast
entries: You lob a pressurised spray of milk. Make a ranged spell attack: {@damage 1d6} bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

spell.name: Sweeten
entries: You turn up to 1 pound of bland food or water into a delectable chocolate treat.

entries.caption: Temporary Hit Points by Caster Level

entries: A creature that eats at least one bite of the treated food within 24 hours gains the listed temporary hit points. A creature can benefit from Sweeten only once per long rest.
At 17th level, this spell also neutralises any non-magical poison present in the targeted food or drink.

spell.name: Bubbly Charm
entries: Effervescent chocolate bubbles float toward a creature you can see. The creature must make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for the duration. While charmed, it regards you as a friendly acquaintance and won’t attack you.
The number of simultaneous targets you can affect increases to two at 11th level and three at 17th level.

spell.name: Molten Chocolate Orb
entries: You fling a sizzling orb of dark chocolate. Make a ranged spell attack: {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage 1d6} fire damage. On a hit, the target’s speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

spell.name: Fudge Patch
entries: A 5-foot square of sticky fudge appears on the ground, becoming difficult terrain. A creature that enters the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have its speed halved until the end of its turn.
The patch expands to a 10-/15-/20-foot square at 5th/11th/17th level. At 17th level, a creature that fails the save is restrained instead of slowed.

spell.name: Whipped Cream Puff
entries: You lob a fluffy cream puff that bursts on impact. Make a ranged spell attack: on a hit, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn. Large or larger creatures have advantage on the save.
At 11th level, the blindness lasts one additional round. At 17th level, you create two puffs and can hurl them at the same or different targets.

spell.name: Cocoa Trail
entries: As you (or the creature carrying you) move, you leave a 5-foot-wide trail of slippery chocolate that persists for the spell’s duration. Creatures entering the trail must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
The width increases to 10 feet at 5th level, 15 feet at 11th, and 20 feet at 17th. At 17th level, a creature that fails the save is restrained until the start of its next turn.

spell.name: Sugar Sparkle
entries: You fling sparkling sugar shards. Make a ranged spell attack: {@damage 1d6} radiant damage (double dice against undead). Until the start of your next turn, the target glows dimly, and the next attack roll made against it has advantage.

spell.name: Warm Cocoa Touch
entries: You infuse a creature with comforting warmth. It gains {@scaledice 1 1dtemp} temporary hit point(s) and advantage on its next saving throw against being frightened or charmed.
At 17th level, the creature also gains resistance to cold damage for 1 minute.

spell.name: Sprinkle Barrage
entries: A shower of sharp candy sprinkles erupts in a 20-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a Dexterity saving throw: on a failure, they take {@damage 1d6} piercing damage and are blinded until the end of their next turn (creatures without eyes ignore the blindness but still take damage).
